function.name: GetRCCoordinate
function.description: Gets a coordinate from the configuration database.

parameter.name: pszKeyName
parameter.description: Name of the key to retrieve.

parameter.name: nDefault
parameter.description: Default value to return if the key cannot be found in the configuration database.

return.description: If the key is found, the return value is the value from the configuration database. If the key cannot be found, the return value is the value of the nDefault parameter.

remarks.p: GetRCCoordinate supports five types of coordinates. A positive integer is interpreted as a distance from the origin (zero). A negative integer is interpreted as a distance from the limit (value of the nLimit parameter). A positive integer with c suffix is interpreted as a distance from the center towards the limit. A negative integer with a c suffix is interpreted as a distance from the center towards the origin. A percentage is a relative distance between the origin and the limit.
